DOC.detailed_description: Prospective report collect approximately 10,000 patient undergoing lumbar cervical spinal surgery use intraoperative monitoring . Patients enrol registry signing informed consent . Data collect prior surgery , surgery , immediately follow surgery 4 6 week post surgery . The registry serve database surgery use IOM .
